greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Final nonzero digit of n! in base 3.
mathematica: fnzd[n_]:=Module[{sidn3=Split[IntegerDigits[n!,3]]},If[MemberQ[ Last[ sidn3],0], sidn3[[-2,1]], sidn3[[-1,1]]]]; Array[fnzd,110,0] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 03 2018 *)
results.author: _Carl R. White_, Jan 16 2008
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 17 2010
